title: Bandbox, 1948-32-1-a,b, 1801–11
medium: Block-printed on handmade paper, cardboard support
inscribed: Inscribed on bottom of box in brown ink: "Catharine/Staples/Box"; inscribed inside lid in brown ink. "Catharine S. Staples" .
provenance: Owned by Catherine Staples, whose name is on the box. Her family lived in New Haven at the corner of Elm and Church Streets. (See donor's letter April 30, 1948.)
description: Very small oval-shaped bandbox. Paper is probably wallpaper: chalky-white flowers and leaves picked out in bright green. Small black dots are sprinkled over a portion of the design. The cover is edged with a fluted design, shaded with dark gray.
